title: Pulled out of Application Mid Game
body: Since I was forced to update Windows 10 yesterday I keep getting pulled out of the game by pressing the E shortcut on my Mercstealth Keyboard. This keyboard has a specific ergonomic area that is meant for gaming alone (which I use instead of the normal keyboard), pressing the E key in this area instantly tabs out League and goes straight to Cortana (which I had fully disabled before).

replies.body: It can be a little hard for us to troubleshoot those keyboards since we didn't have a hand in developing them, but I did a little research for you and it looks like those Merstealths are a part of the steelseries keyboards. I'd first double check that you've got all of your drivers updated by checking [**this site**](https://steelseries.com/downloads). If that doesn't help, you might be able to find some better support by looking through their forums.

The problem was driver related. With the new Windows 10 Creator update it apparently wiped the keyboard driver from my system overriding any settings the keyboard brought innately. A quick download of the required driver fixed the issue.
